entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump A week ago, Donald Trump said that #coronavirus would drop to zero. Today we have over 1,000 confirmed cases (many more not confirmed). And The White House is still trying to cut #publichealth. It's a crisis that this president’s inept leadership helped create. #CoronaVirusUpdate
